Product Description

Easy Set Up for Outdoor & Indoor Lighting

Warm Tips:

The recommended installation height is 6.56ft-13.12ft, the best installation height is 8ft-9ft.If you want to install security camera on the opposite side of the battery lights, please avoid infrared directly irradiated or reflection on the sensor.Make sure batteries are inserted correctly before you test activation.It is Battery Powered, NOT Solar Powered, NOT AC Power Hardwired.Note: Please allow 1% failure rate of the outdoor motion light due to the long distance of transport maybe cause damage or accessories lost. TOOWELL Battery Operated Outdoor Flood Lights

Instant Convenience with Motion Detector Lights

Installation instructionsï¼š

1. Use a flat head screwdriver to remove the Mounting Plate

2. Insert 4 D-cell Batteries and revert the battery lid

3. Mark the fixed position and fix the mounting plate on the wall

4. Line up the light with the mounting plate and slide the light into grooves

Package Contents:

1 x PIR LED Outdoor Motion Sensor Light

1 x User Manual

4 screws and 4 anchors

Outdoor Battery Operated Lights (NOT Solar Powered)

Friendly Motion Sensor Light Mode: With an advanced sensitive photocell sensor, the battery powered Led flood light will be activated and stay on for the 20s (when the ambient light is lower than 15LUX). Stay off at the daytime(only sensing motion in darkness). Auto LED motion detection security light like a steward ensures safety for children,pets,and the old from dusk to dawn.
Save Money on an Electrician: Outdoor battery operated floodlight adopt wireless wall-mounted design,Easy to install this outdoor lights for house and yard in minutesâ€“No main power or wiring or professional electrician required.Where sunlight and electricity can’t reach, TOOWELL battery operated outdoor lights can light up.
Customized Your Beam Angleï¼šAdjustable angle brings flexible light to your home. Battery powered spotlights Dual head support 135Â°up to down,180Â°side to side pivot, customized led spot lights coverage area around the house.
Efficient Battery Powered Outdoor Light: LED units output 4.5w,480lumen,5500K(daylight white), equivalent to 50W halogen light, a brand new set of 4*D batteries standby time up to 180 days. saving your electricity bill by up to 80%.
Sensitive and Durableï¼šBattery powered Security light with upgrade technic motion sensor can be triggered by the moving human, cars, or animals up to 30 feet sensing range at 180Â°motion detection angle. When motion caught, it lighting.
3 Years Warrantyï¼šBased on its reliable and durable performance,we offer 3-year warranty while others are just 1 yearï¼Œcustomer service team provides 7*24 hrs help, and your satisfaction is 100% guaranteed. You don’t need to send the prdoduct back if TOOWELL product did not meet your expectation,Please contact us and get your money back.

Easy Set Up for Outdoor & Indoor Lighting

Warm Tips:

  • The recommended installation height is 6.56ft-13.12ft, the best installation height is 8ft-9ft.
  • If you want to install security camera on the opposite side of the battery lights, please avoid infrared directly irradiated or reflection on the sensor.
  • Make sure batteries are inserted correctly before you test activation.
  • It is Battery Powered, NOT Solar Powered, NOT AC Power Hardwired.
  • Note: Please allow 1% failure rate of the outdoor motion light due to the long distance of transport maybe cause damage or accessories lost. Just find us for a replacement if there is something wrong or get your spend back if it doesn’t meet your need.
